title: HausKI System Signals
description: Smoothed system resource metrics (CPU, Memory, GPU) for meta-cognitive monitoring. Metrics are updated every 2 seconds with Exponential Moving Average (EMA, alpha=0.1) smoothing to reduce noise.

cpu_load.description: Global CPU load in percent (0.0 - 100.0), smoothed via EMA.

memory_pressure.description: Memory pressure in percent (0.0 - 100.0), smoothed via EMA.

gpu_available.description: Whether an NVIDIA GPU is detected available (heuristic check at startup via nvidia-smi).
